questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Lokar Searunner on Rellekka's westernmost dock. (Chat 2•1•✓)
Speak to Brundt the Chieftain in the Longhall for a seal of passage. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: You will need to keep the seal on you while on the island. Talking to anyone without it will teleport you back to Rellekka.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to Lokar. (Chat 1)
Climb the ladders and board the pirate ship. Talk to Captain Bentley about sailing to Lunar Isle. (Chat 4)
Make sure you are wearing the seal of passage before you talk to Captain Bentley.
Speak to Captain Bentley again.
Climb down the stairs in the first southern cabin.
Talk to Birds-Eye Jack to the south-west, below deck.
Talk to Captain Bentley again. (Chat 2)
Return to 'Birds-Eye' Jack again.
Report back to Captain Bentley.
Must talk to them in the order in Additional Info
additionalStepInformation: Talk to 'Eagle-eye' Shultz at the very front of the ship (back upstairs).
Talk to 'Beefy' Burns on the lowest level of the ship.
Talk to 'Lecherous' Lee on the very top level, at the south end of the ship.
Talk to First mate 'Davey-boy' on the southern end of the deck near the stairs.
Climb up to the top level at the south end of the ship and talk to the cabin boy. He is next to Lecherous Lee.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use the lens on the lantern. Light it.
Use the lantern on the following objects and rub away the symbols list in Additional Info (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Cannon: Eastern cannon a few steps away (same level as cabin boy).
Wallchart: Climb down the ladder and enter the southernmost room. The wallchart is on the northwestern wall.
Chest: Climb down to the lowest level of the ship. The chest is on the ground at the northern end of the ship, close to the support column.
Crate: On the same level, east of the cook, find a stack of two crates.
Support column: A few steps north.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Captain Bentley.
Climb down the ladders and walk into the city.
After the cutscene, talk to Meteora in the southwestern part of the village.
Run North out of the city, and kill suqah. You need one suqah tooth and four suqah hides.
additionalStepInformation: They drop guam and marrentill commonly.

questSteps.stepDescription: Mine a lunar ore at the mine north-east of the city. Climb down the ladder and mine a stalagmite to the West of the rune essence rock.
additionalStepInformation: Stalagmite's look like a rock jutting out of the ground.
Optional: Mine Rune Essence to complete Runes on the Moon, which is a Hard Fremennik achievement.

questSteps.stepDescription: Run to the south-eastern part of the island. Talk to Oneiromancer near the Astral altar.
Talk to Baba Yaga in the walking house with at least one inventory space free. (Chat 2)
Use the vial on the sink, add a guam and a marrentill. Grind the suqah tooth, and use it on the vial.
Return to the Oneiromancer with the potion.
Use your Dramen staff/staves on the following altars in the order in Additional Info (you may need talismans to access if you don't have alternate teleports)
additionalStepInformation: Air (west of Varrock)
Fire (north of Al Kharid)
Water (Lumbridge Swamp)
Earth (south of Fort Forinthry)

questSteps.stepDescription: Travel back to Lunar Isle and give a lunar staff to the Oneiromancer.
If you have already made the lunar helm you can skip this step if not follow the steps in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Climb down ladder north-eastern part of the isle.
Mine a stalagmite for a lunar ore.
You have to use a furnace to smith the ore (the forge in the southern building will not work).
Use an anvil to make the helm, such as the one in the southern building.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Pauline north-west in the city and the answer is "Jane Blud-Hagic-Maid" (Chat 2 • ~)
Talk to Meteora south in the city.
Kill Suqahs until one drops a special tiara.
additionalStepInformation: If you haven't already, pick up their hide as well as you'll need four hides later on.

questSteps.stepDescription: Give Meteora the tiara.
Talk to Rimae Sirsalis in the clothing store south of the bank about ceremonial clothes. (Chat 2)
Talk to Rimae Sirsalis again, she will tan your hides. (Chat 2•1)
additionalStepInformation: If you didn't bring thread, Rimae's shop sells some.

questSteps.stepDescription: Craft a lunar torso, trousers, gloves, and boots from your hides.
Go to the biggest building in the city (west of the lodestone) and talk to Selene. (Chat 2)
Exit the city and run south. Dig up the blue flowers with a spade (tool belt doesn't work).
Give the Oneiromancer all your lunar gear.
Talk to the Oneiromancer again with 11 free inventory slots.
Use the vial on the kindling the Oneiromancer just gave you to create Soaked kindling.
Run to the biggest building in the city (west of the lodestone).
additionalStepInformation: Get your combat runes and supplies, dismiss your follower, and wear all your lunar items. Four backpack spaces are required.
Do not carry an augmented crystal hatchet in the backpack to avoid a bug later in the quest.

questSteps.stepDescription: Light the ceremonial brazier then use the Soaked kindling on it.
additionalStepInformation: If you exit to lobby or log-out during the dream state you will have to speak to the Oneironmancer again to retrieve your potion and kindling.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Ethereal Man or Ethereal Lady
Step on the yellow/green platform south-west of the island.
Talk to Ethereal Fluke.
additionalStepInformation: He will call out a number.
You need to make the dice add up to the number he called.
When you "roll" one of the dice, it will turn the die upside down, so each die only has two possible numbers (1 and 6, 2 and 5, 3 and 4).

questSteps.stepDescription: He eventually teleports you back to the middle.
Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.
Head south-east and step on the pink/purple platform.
Talk to Ethereal Numerator use the Image at this step to determine what to choose. Read the Additional Information Section to see more on this guy.
additionalStepInformation: Click on the numbers to complete the patterns for four times.
If you click on numbers without completing the dialogue, the sequence will be incorrect.

questSteps.stepDescription: He eventually teleports you back to the middle.
Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.
Head north-east and step on the blue platform.
Talk to Ethereal Perceptive. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: He might give you a hatchet.
Do not carry an augmented crystal hatchet in the backpack or you will be given the following message: "You do not have a hatchet which you have the Woodcutting level to use".

questSteps.stepDescription: Run west and chop 20 dream logs, depositing them on your log pile.
He will teleport you once you've won the competition.
Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.
Head north-west and step on the grey platform.
Talk to Ethereal Guide.
Cross the chasm by jumping on the correct combination of Dream Puffs. Keep a note of the correct steps! Use the Memorization button to keep track!
Once complete, talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.
Head east and step on the yellow platform.
Talk to Ethereal Expert and start the race. (Chat 1)
Jump over the hurdles. Run and stop before each hurdle, before clicking the orb to jump over.
additionalStepInformation: If you fail three times, you will lose the race.

questSteps.stepDescription: After you have won talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.
Head south-east and step on the green platform.
Talk to Ethereal Mimic. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Click on them and then copy the emote that they perform. They teleport after each correct emote.

questSteps.stepDescription: After five correct emotes, they'll teleport you back.
Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady to begin the final fight. (Chat 1)
Kill Me. You can safe-spot them behind the dream tree.
additionalStepInformation: Should you forget your runes after entering the fight, you will not be able to leave the fight in any way unless you log out and back in.
This will take you back to Lunar Isle where you can bank to get the runes.
Talk to Oneiromancer again to get the kindling and potion to return.

questSteps.stepDescription: Read the lectern to return to Lunar Isle. (Chat 1)
Talk to the Oneiromancer.
Quest complete!
